blueprints.description: Manages the contextual information surrounding every action execution.
Provides a discoverable mapping of action names to their handler functions.
Detects patterns in queries, adapts controllers, and proposes new capability routes.
Schedules and adopts evolved capabilities and creates rollout plans for new system versions.
Performs deep reflective synthesis, hypothesis generation, and creates insight plans for complex problems.
Executes Process Blueprints with phase-gates, context passing, and IAR enforcement.
Composes prompts from SPRs, context, and tool schemas for the LLM.
Provides an interface to Large Language Models with IAR compliance.
Performs web searches and returns structured results with IAR compliance.
Executes code in a sandboxed environment with IAR compliance.
Performs forecasting, classification, and regression tasks on data.
Uncovers causal relationships in data using statistical methods.
Parses and executes Agent-Based Models defined in a Domain-Specific Language.
Creates and runs agent-based simulations for complex systems.
A specialized agent-based model for combat scenarios.
Analyzes timelines of events to build temporal models and detect contradictions.
Transforms candidate insights into durable SPRs in the knowledge graph.
Vets artifacts against criteria such as logic, ethics, facts, and protocol compliance.
Caches responses to reduce redundant token usage.
Provides a real-time communication bridge for protocol events.
Provides a URL to a UI for debugging roadmaps, IAR, and telemetry.
Parses markdown specifications to extract executable artifacts.
Performs Comparative Fluxual Processing for quantum-enhanced system analysis.
Provides deterministic utilities for stochastic pipelines and quantum-inspired calculations.
Manages system configuration from environment variables and config files.
Defines the scalable framework for distributed operation.
Manages the lifecycle of SPRs in the knowledge graph.
A file-backed implementation of the Distributed ArchE Registry.
